author: Staff Reporter
text:
Detained under Goondas Act

A 32-year-old youth, who was involved in smuggling ganja from Andhra Pradesh and selling it in the State regularly was detained under the Goondas Act here on Friday. S. Anandaraj alias Raja of Nadar Street in Sankari taluk was involved in the smuggling of ganja and cases were registered in Coimbatore, Vellore and Salem. Hence, Collector V. Sampath ordered his detention under the Act. Likewise, the city police detained a history-sheet under the Goondas Act.
title: Two detained under Goondas Act
